org.jivesoftware.spark.ui.conferences
Class BookmarkedConferences

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.jivesoftware.spark.ui.conferences.BookmarkedConferences
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class BookmarkedConferences
extends javax.swing.JPanel

BookmarkedConferences is used to display the UI for all bookmarked conference rooms.

See Also:
